Class GuiNumberField

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiTextField

          • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.component.input.GuiNumberField

  • public class GuiNumberField
extends GuiTextFieldExtended
    A number field which by default only accepts positive numbers.
